title: Kubernetes Pod scheduling
description: How the tolerations, node affinity affect the pod scheduling

steps.title: Apply label and taint on node
Create a pod with the corresponding toleration and podSize=SMALL
Change the node label to podSize=MEDIUM, redeploy the same pod
Change the node label to podSize=LARGE, recreate the pod with the same rule
Create a pod with the corresponding toleration and podSize=LARGE
